name: Addictive Cabbage
description: Japanese people are known for their love for salty food, but it's easy to adjust the quantities to suit your taste. Feel free to reduce the salt and chicken stock if it's too salty for you. Also, if you want to make this dish suitable for vegetarians and vegans, you can simply substitute the chicken bouillon powder for vegetable stock powder or a little extra salt.
